game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find the lost treasure and return it to its rightful owner
game.description:
You have been tasked with finding the lost treasure of El Dorado, a legendary city of gold. 
      The treasure is said to hold immeasurable wealth and power. The fate of the world may depend on your success.
game.reward: Ancient artifacts, gold coins, and eternal glory

task.description: To find the treasure, you must first locate the ancient map that will guide you to its hidden location. The map is said to be held by a mysterious hermit in the heart of the jungle.

task.objective: Defeat the guardians of the cave
task.description: Once you have obtained the map, you must journey to the Cave of Wonders to access the treasure. However, the cave is guarded by powerful beings with supernatural abilities. You must overcome their challenges to reach the treasure.
Finally, you will reach the chamber where the lost treasure is kept. You must navigate through complex traps and puzzles to reach the treasure and claim it as your own.
task.location: The Chamber of the Lost Treasure
